channel.title: Pleaseee helpp mee withhh problemm
channel.description: im new here and i got a server running it says connecting to port 43594 and then when i run client i type in ip and once i do it goes to someones server. how to make a new server lik where im the owner or admin? im not sure if its worded right i hope u get it :confused:

item.title: Pleaseee helpp mee withhh problemm
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:8, topic:300562”][quote author=jaydog0420 link=topic=396825.msg2947309#msg2947309 date=1252274684]
read tutorials. i just dont get it and im not using no ip to host. im using hamichi. its easier
[/quote]
No-ip isn’t a host, but Hamachi is…
I suppose that’d work, anyways.[/quote]

Actually you are wrong, no-ip is a hosting company. And you’re all wrong about his issue… Obviously there is something in the client class files, pointing the ip to this other server. So say its pwnscape for example, I recommend dling notepad++. It has a feature where you can find all files, meaning you type the keyword “pwnscape” and select find all documents. IF you see pwnscape.no-ip or whatever the servers name is change it to yours.

Read full topic

-Sexy Slay

item.title: Pleaseee helpp mee withhh problemm
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

jaydog0420:

thats the only way=( my friend made his own using someones on here but hes owner and stuff, its the same exact on here

Well, reading the tutorial, you’ll find that you need to “Download a source” and “Download a client” that you’ll use. Then you can make yourself owner and stuff afterwards.
Read the tutorial over and you’ll find you’ll be doing exactly what your friend did.

item.title: Pleaseee helpp mee withhh problemm
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

jaydog0420:

im new here and i got a server running it says connecting to port 43594 and then when i run client i type in ip and once i do it goes to someones server. how to make a new server lik where im the owner or admin? im not sure if its worded right i hope u get it

You want to make your own server. Basically… Oh joy…
You need to be able to:
-Use the search bar
-Ask for help appropriately. (Meaning, try and type neater so we can understand your problems)
-Understand basic java
-Follow detailed instructions
-Read the rules; we’re not a spoonfeeding community, so, you’ll have to learn some things on your own, through trial and error.
-And most importantly, don’t post multiple topics.
(Post ALL your problems in one topic.
–If the topic is 24 hours old, you can post another one.
–Try and accumulate SOME problems, then post them all {3 minimum is a decent number…} in one topic, so we can try and help you without you having to spam the help section)

Also, if you have any compiler/batch related problems, post them in the sticky “POST ALL COMPILER/BATCH RELATED PROBLEMS HERE” as a reply. People do check that at times.

In order to START making a server, look in the tutorial section.
There’s a topic there “How to start a server” right on the top.

Happy coding.

Read full topic
